plot: This is a compilation of previously unseen live footage of "Bad Religion" and "The Circle Jerks" on tour together from 1984. Released in 1995, with some new footage.
title: The Best of Flipside Video #1
plot_es: This is a compilation of previously unseen live footage of "Bad Religion" and "The Circle Jerks" on tour together from 1984. Released in 1995, with some new footage.
